title: Calls for exhibition recognising Billy Connolly to be held in Glasgow
description: A Billy Connolly exhibition should be held at Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum to recognise his contribution to Glasgow. title: Hunt: Less scope for tax cuts in March Budget than in the autumn
description: Jeremy Hunt said it is unlikely he will have “the kind of room that I had for those very big tax cuts” in the autumn statement. The Chancellor confirmed that he warned the Cabinet there is less scope for tax reductions in his March 6 Budget despite clamour within the Tory ranks for cuts to try to woo voters.

title: Keir Starmer clashes with Rishi Sunak over Iceland worker's mortgage
